select gid from graph where name= #name# and version = #version#
select name, value from nodeprops where nid = #value#
select destnid as DESTNID, rule from destination where nid = #value#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT NEXTVAL( 'node_seq')
insert into node ( nid, gid, name, nodetype, description ) values ( #nid#, #gid#, #name#, #nodetype#, #description# )
insert into nodeprops( nid, name, value ) values( #nid#, #name#, #val# )
insert into destination (nid, destnid, rule ) values ( #nid#, #destnid#, #rule#)
insert into graph ( gid, name, description, version, nid ) values ( #gid#, #name#, #description#, #version#, #nid# )
